original_text: For though ye had smitten the whole army of the Chaldeans that fight against you, and there remained but wounded men among them, yet should they rise up every man in his tent, and burn this city with fire.
korean_text: 가령 너희가 너희를 치는 갈대아인의 온 군대를 쳐서 그 중에 부상자만 남긴다 할지라도 그들이 각기 장막에서 일어나 이 성을 불사르리라

sentences.original_text: For though ye had smitten the whole army
of the Chaldeans that fight against you
and there remained but wounded men among them
yet should they rise up every man in his tent
and burn this city with fire
